comments.author: Alin Vasile
comments.body: A variant of Ryan's solution that removes completely the redirect method in LaxStrategy.

comments.author: Ryan Smith
comments.body: Thanks Alin, that's a much cleaner approach.

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Patch checked in. Many thanks for contributing it.

Oleg

description:
LaxRedirectStrategy extends the defaulRedirect class but does not call the super method as one would expect.

Just adding a patch to make sure it gets called.
summary: New LaxRedirectStrategy class should probably call the super method first.
